title: bArO brahmAdi
sahitya:
bArO brahmAdi vandya 


anupallavi

  bArO vasudEva nandana


caraNam 1    dhigi dhigi nI kuNidADuta bArO dInarakSakane candadi 
jagadIsha nI kuNidADuta bArO cenna kEshavane
    caraNam 2    gollara manege pOgalu bEDa gOvinda kELO ninage 
hAlu beNNe mosarikkuve uNNa bArO
    caraNam 3    dODDa doDDa muttina hAra hAki nODuveno nInu 
dODDa purada dvArakAvAsa purandara viTTala
